entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server MainLayout not always disposed with long polling #41056
  • Blazor project template - lower left nav can be inaccessible in short browser window #41050
  • Blazor wasm: Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime, when calling odata in OnInitializedAsync #41046
  • Tag a new version of the SignalR C++ client project, push out to vcpkg #41045
  • PassThroughAuthorizationHandler does not respect AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure #41043
  • HTTP/3: Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41042

Closed

  • Quarantine StartupTimeoutIsApplied #40036
    Test failures
  • ExcludedRoles parameter in Authorize and AuthorizeView #41012
  • An exception "SqlException: Cannot open database "aspnet-xxxx" requested by the login." thrown when register a new user for the 7.0 web InAuth project. #40994
  • Adding MessagePack causes TypeLoadException #40876
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" #41023
  • [Blazor WASM] <details> @ontoggle goes into loop on page reload(Ctrl+R) #41004
  • Renderer flags components as disposed even though they are not (for IAsyncDisposable) in Blazor #41017
  • Published app can't be accesed #41020

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Uninstalling Hosting Bundle should uninstall chained runtimes #41057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Update branding to 2.1.34 #41055
    2.1.x
  • Remove BuildX64 target #41040
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.17 #41048
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.17
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #41000
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40807
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40967
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Unquarantine test #40888
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [6.0] Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40859
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Get richnav.yml building again #40783
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Update branding to 6.0.5 #41049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Move FabricBot to Preview4 #41044
    7.0-preview4
  • Mark DataProtection.Azure* as non-shipping #41007
    area-dataprotection, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40998
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • Update branding to 3.1.25 #41047
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • Fix DatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter to handle wrapped DbExceptions #41041
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4.22204.1 #41038
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-mvc, ask-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
